department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and deliver pillow forms to Correctional Service Canada in Manitoba.
description: The Correctional Service Canada has a requirement to supply and deliver pillow forms to Correctional Service Canada in Manitoba, on an as-and when requested basis. Orders will be issued on an "as & when requested" basis from the date of issuance of the Standing Offer for a period of two (2) years with the possibility to extend for two (2) additional one-year period. Estimated quantity per year: 6,500 units. Items are requested to be delivered in Stony Mountain, Manitoba.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

**Reference:** WS4279457999-Doc4286869108

**Solicitation Number:** WS4279457999

**Publication Date:** November 1, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 14, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Amendment Date:** November 27, 2023

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Supplier Information:**
------------------------

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement to supply and deliver pillow forms to correctional facilities in Manitoba.

**Description of Requirement:**
-----------------------------

The CSC requires a supplier to provide and deliver pillow forms on an as-and-when-requested basis for a period of two (2) years with the possibility to extend for two (2) additional one-year periods. Estimated quantity per year is 6,500 units.

**Delivery Information:**
------------------------

Items must be delivered to Stony Mountain, Manitoba.

**Procurement Details:**
----------------------

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:**
------------------

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
-------------------------

This tender opportunity is available to suppliers in Canada.

**Contracting Entity:**
----------------------

* **Department:** Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

Agustin Coronado (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: <agustin.coronado@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

The procurement documents are available on the public websites [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17888994?extsite=MTc4ODg5OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17888994?extsite=MTc4ODg5OTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)  or through the applicable marginalized participation process. 

Please note:
